name: NormanPD Incident Insight Visualizer
description: A web platform to process, augment, and visualize police incident reports with 7 detailed visualizations and downloadable data insights.

name: Clinical Trial Recruitment
description: Analyzed Reddit data with sentiment analysis and AI-generated personalized messages for recruiting participants in diabetes-related clinical trials.

name: Fine-tune Weak LLMs for Accurate Extraction of SDOH
description: Developed and fine-tuned a GPT-2 model to extract SDoH from clinical records, achieving 85.56% accuracy and outperforming state-of-the-art methods.

name: Data Censoror
description: Automates sensitive data redaction using regex, spaCy, and Google Cloud NLP, ensuring privacy in documents such as police reports and medical records.

name: Design of Efficient Classification Model for Paramecium and Hydra
description: Improved classification accuracy using GANs to balance datasets and Inception model for superior performance with 96.49% accuracy.

name: Gator Taxi System Project
description: Optimized ride-hailing operations using advanced data structures, reducing request management time complexity from O(n) to O(log n).

name: Portfolio
description: A portfolio website inspired by VSCode, designed to showcase my projects, experiences, education, and skills to fellow developers and potential recruiters.
